entries.help_join: Click this button to display a window where you can subscribe to new chat channels.
entries.help_name: The name displayed for this chat tab.
entries.help_default: Click this button to set the channel where text entered from this chat tab goes.
entries.help_tab: This list contains the chat channels which will display in this tab.  To remove a channel from displaying in this tab, double-click it or select it and click the arrows.
entries.help_available:
This is the Tab Management page.

From here you can select what channels display in the tab.

This first list displays what built in channels are available but are not currently being displayed in this tab.
